title: Find Zevlor
content: em. Some of them were able to run free, but the others stayed captured, including Zevlor. You'll have to try and find him. Zevlor can be found in a pod in Mind Flayer Colony (X694 Y14, you can only reach this location after you defeat Ketheric in Moonrise Towers). Once you free him, you need to fight the mind flayer and intellect devourers in the room. After the battle, if Zevlor survives, he explains to you how he was enthralled by the Absolute. He can join you in Act 3 in quest Gather Your All
